website_summaries.verdict: This gold-colored chronograph watch is striking to look at and exceptionally well-made.
pros: A stylish yet practical choice for everyday, with a solid, chunky appearance
The quartz movement keeps time very well
Chronograph dials keep track of seconds, minutes, and hours, and can be used as stopwatch
cons: Some wearers find it too large for their tastes

customer_reviews.title: Exceeded Expectations!
customer_reviews.text: Love it! I’ve been wanting a nice watch for some time now but could never find one that met all my needs at the right price. I wanted: sleek, gold, durable, elegant, and quality. And of course, the right price. Honestly, for this price this watch is well worth every penny! I’ve seen some folks say the gold tarnished or scratches on the bottom so I’ll have to update if so. Honestly I have tons of friends with MK watches and I haven’t seen that be the case for any of them...so we’ll see! Overall, this is a great buy and I’m super happy to start rocking it solo and with some bracelets:)
customer_reviews.author: AshFerg 1

customer_reviews.title: This is a beautiful gold watch for the gold obsessed
customer_reviews.text: This is a beautiful gold watch for the gold obsessed! It looks so classy and the face is beautiful! I got it for Christmas in 2012 and had a couple links taken out right away. I have been pretty rough with is and so it has a small scratch on the glass and the band has some light scratches but they are not noticeable. I don't wear it as much since I have an apple watch now, but I still love it and it's always my back up!
customer_reviews.author: AmberHale

customer_reviews.title: Dont buy its fake
customer_reviews.text: I find out what ive order is a fake mk watch no logo at the back of the watch like the original youll find it clear together with the number, i just waste my money all i thought it was original
customer_reviews.author: Rjay

customer_reviews.title: one of the best investments i have ever purchased
customer_reviews.text: one of the best investments i have ever purchased. i knock my hand around a lot, and this has taken quite a beating. the sizing is nice, not too large and not too small/delicate. the gold tone does wear off over time as other reviewers have mentioned, but it's mostly centralized around the joints and edges such that it's not very noticeable. if you're not sure about this, stroll into a nordstrom or michael kors retail store to try it on. they remove links for you, for free, so that it fits well on your wrist.
customer_reviews.author: nicky

customer_reviews.title: Fake
customer_reviews.text: It is fake... The gold color turn dark, and that desnt happens with an original MK
customer_reviews.author: Hazel

customer_reviews.title: Not a fake!
customer_reviews.text: Very nice watch. Doesn’t look to be a fake like previously reviewed. Worth the money for sure!
customer_reviews.author: jamie

customer_reviews.title: Value and appearance.
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful watch. Pretty heavy and had to have a couple of links removed to fit my wrist. I love the look of this watch.
customer_reviews.author: t.thompson

customer_reviews.title: Total knockoff!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this to replace the exact same watch that has been my main watch for years and it is in now way the same quality. It is so light you might as well have spent $20 on a cheep gold watch from Walmart.
customer_reviews.author: Ericka

customer_reviews.title: Durable and fashion
customer_reviews.text: Durable. Lasted a very long time and Beautiful detail. Great to give as a gift for the fashion lovers out there !

customer_reviews.title: Works fine. I love it
customer_reviews.text: Works fine. I love it, but it came with a big scratch on the middle piece on the gold part & has a little bit of discoloration on the links. You can only notice close up so it's not that bad but I love it otherwise
customer_reviews.author: Haselah

customer_reviews.title: Love this MK watch
customer_reviews.text: Love this MK watch, had no scratches, came in it’s nice little box. I was so scared about some of the reviews but I don’t have any complaints because my watch came perfect 😝💯.
customer_reviews.author: sharika

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Just received my watch today and I love it! It looks exactly like how I imagined it. The gold is beautiful and i received it in a perfect condition. The seller really packaged well and it also came in a Michael Kors box. The price was also amazing! i know i'll be able to use this watch for a very long time. :)

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my wife. She really loves her gift

customer_reviews.title: Love the watch - but BIG
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for an oversized, men's style gold watch, and this fit the bill perfectly. The quality is good, and the watch looks nice. But the watch face is large - truly the size of a men's watch. If that's what you're looking for, it's a great choice!
customer_reviews.author: Katie P.

customer_reviews.title: I bought this watch in February and in April it ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought this watch in February and in April it broke. A piece of the band fell off and it cannot be fixed, it needs to be replaced. I can no longer return it, and I can pay $60 to send it back to Michael Kors to have it fixed.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Received my watch today. On time as expected. I love everything MK. This is my 2nd watch by him. It's a bit big on my wrist, but nothing that taking it to the jeweler to remove a couple of links won't fix. Can't wait to wear it :-)

customer_reviews.title: The only problem was the return policy. If you ...
customer_reviews.text: The only problem was the return policy. If you break the seal and something goes wrong, the buyer won't refund. So beware.

customer_reviews.title: The 2nd time I have purchased this watch. I ...
customer_reviews.text: The 2nd time I have purchased this watch. I purchased the first one over 6 years ago. The only reason I had to replace is that I cracked the edge of the glass dome over the dial.

Looks great layered with other bracelets, would DEFINITELY purchase again! Came with the original box & MK Care Instructions, also the original MK price tag... VERY fast shipping! Now I am eyeing the silver tone & ceramic watches by MK and will definitely purchase them from this seller again. Very Satisfied!

customer_reviews.title: My favorite watch
customer_reviews.text: I wear this watch every day and I get many compliments on it. It is by far, my favorite watch. My only complaint is that after two months of normal, daily wear, the gold plating is already starting to wear off in some areas. Not sure how I will address this issue in the future (surely it will need to be addressed) but in the meantime, this is still my favorite watch.

customer_reviews.title: Love it! Great price.

If you have a small hand you may want to remove some of the links, otherwise it's beautiful. I went into the MK store and saw the watch for full price and glad I received it at a bargain!

customer_reviews.title: Skinny Wrist
customer_reviews.text: I wanted a boyfriend watch really bad,and I love the Michael Kors watches,but the big problem I have is I have a very tiny wrist,and most of the boyfriend watches look awkward on my wrist. I felt this one may not cause the face is smaller,so I took a chance and I was right. I knew no matter what watch I chose I would have to take out links,but once I did that it's now perfect and I love it as a matter of fact my older daughter said she was jealous she wanted one to.

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful. Have had for a couple weeks and so ...

customer_reviews.author: corise

customer_reviews.title: Michael Kors Addict
customer_reviews.text: I love this watch and wanted it for years before I finally gave in and bought it. Yes, it tarnishes and scratches on the underside because I wear it everyday at work and it hits into things which is NORMAL! With everything, the more you use something, the more worn it gets. Take better care of it if your so concerned about the scratches. I still love it and get many compliments on it. Michael is the man.
customer_reviews.author: Johanna

customer_reviews.title: A ladies' watch with a masculine feel
customer_reviews.text: I am really happy with my purchase. I was looking for a watch with a masculine style and I think it was the perfect choice. Not to mention that it looks a lot more expensive than it really is :) The watch is a little on the heavy side, but once you've worn it for a couple of minutes it's not a problem anymore. I have tiny wrists and was concerned that it would look too oversized, but it's not the case. PlainPaperBag excelled in their service, thank you very much guys!

customer_reviews.title: I don't think they are real deal. I lost ...
customer_reviews.text: I don't think they are real deal. I lost my Michael Kors (original) watch and wanted to replaced it. When i got this one , the package looks very suspicious. the instructions book, seemed photocopied from an original. i was able to compare the original box (which i already had) with this one and you can see the difference in the detail. If you want to buy something that looks "original" without paying the original price, this could be an option but definitely not an original Michael Kors watch.

product_meta.title: Michael Kors Women's MK5055 - Runway Chronograph
product_meta.description:
Michael Kors Runway Watch. Gold plated stainless steel chronograph watch. Water resistant up to 100 meters. Removeable links. Single deployant buckle closure. Case diameter: 38mm. Imported. Find your perfect fit (PDF) .




PRODUCT DETAILS
 * Is Discontinued By Manufacturer :No
 * Product Dimensions :3.54 x 3.54 x 3.54 inches; 5.57 Ounces
 * Item model number :MK5055
 * Department :Women
 * Batteries :1 Lithium Metal batteries required. (included)
 * Date First Available :October 4, 2005
 * Manufacturer :Michael Kors
 * ASIN :B000XJ7GFK

 * Amazon Best Sellers Rank: #798,570 in Clothing, Shoes & Jewelry (See Top 100 in Clothing, Shoes & Jewelry)  *  #359589 inWomen's Shops 
    *  #4153 inWomen's Wrist Watches 
   
   

 * Customer Reviews:4.5 out of 5 stars576 ratings Michael Kors Runway Watch. Gold plated stainless steel chronograph watch. Water resistant up to 100 meters. Removeable links. Single deployant buckle closure. Case diameter: 38mm. Imported. Find your perfect fit (PDF) .
feature_bullets: Round watch featuring luminous hands/stick indices, three chronograph subdials, and date window
37 mm gold-tone stainless steel case with mineral dial window
Stainless steel bracelet with fold-over clasp and double push-button safety
Water resistant to 100 m (330 ft): In general, suitable for swimming and snorkeling, but not scuba diving
